comments: The product images are of our copy for sale. Mild scuffing to LP surfaces, very light crackle underneath music, never overpowering music. Light moisture stains on both labels (product images are our copy for sale). Generic sleeve with hand written album title. Will ship with insurance. Serious offers will be considered.

seller.shipping:
By placing an order you agree to our terms below.

Please ASK all question BEFORE placing an order. 
Please make shipping inquiries BEFORE placing orders.

We accept Paypal  only.

All media visually graded unless stated otherwise.

No guarantees on additional downloadable content.

******* NEW CHEAPER INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING RATES!!! Check your estimate below. *******

Shipping estimates for standard items:

USA:
● 1 lb or less (approximately 1-3 CDs) : $3.99 
● 1.1 lbs - 2 lbs (approximately 1 LP): $4.99
● 2.1 lbs - 3 lbs: $5.99

Canada:
● 8 oz or less (approximately 1 CD): $8.99
● 8 oz - 2 lbs (approximately 1 LP or 2-4 CDs): $12.99
● 2.1 lbs - 3 lbs: $19.99
● 3.1lbs - 4lbs:  $29.99

Australia, Japan, Hong Kong, South Korea, China (Australians, Discogs will add GST once shipping is added):
● 8 oz or less (approximately 1 CD): $10.99 
● 8 oz - 2 lbs (approximately 1 LP or 2-4 CDs): $16.99 
● 2.1 lbs - 3 lbs: 25.99
● 3.1lbs - 4lbs: $39.99

Europe & Israel: 
● 8 oz or less (approximately 1 CD): 10.99
● 8 oz - 2lbs (approximately 1 LP or 2-4 CDs): $17.99 
● 2.1 lbs - 3 lbs: $26.99
● 3.1lbs - 4lbs: $43.99

REST OF WORLD:
● 8 oz or less (approximately 1 CD): $10.99
● 8 oz - 2lbs (approximately 1 LP or 2-4 CDs): $17.99 
● 2.1 lbs - 3 lbs:  $27.99
● 3.1lbs - 4lbs: $45.99

Note: Double records, CD sets and box sets do not count as standard items.

Buyers from Central and South America please write for shipping information.

- Buyer pays for all shipping.
- We ship using USPS Media Mail by default. 
- All shipments automatically come with USPS tracking, please check the USPS website to see if tracking is valid in your country. 
- We are happy to customize and combine shipping for multiple purchases or upgrade the shipping class. 
- Please inquire for customized shipping quotes.

International buyers are responsible for all customs related charges and business.
We don't alter customs value for international orders.

International buyers using freight forwarding companies based in the USA, will be required to pay for additional $3.00 signature confirmation. 
We are not responsible for what happens to your item once your freight forwarding company signs for the package.


We do not remove jewel cases.

In Store Pick up & Payment:
Pick up is possible but must be pre-arranged.
Please write to us to give advanced notice of store pick ups and for payment information. We will confirm when an item is ready for you to collect.
Additional taxes apply for in-store payments. 

Shipping is non refundable
